title: Wrong multiplication in MNIST beginner tutorial
body_html:
(Not sure if this is the right place to report a problem with this tutorial.)

I believe that the explanation of matrix multiplication in this image is wrong.

It should be W_1,1 x_1 + W_1,2 x_2 + W_1,3 x_3... (i.e., x should increase per row, not per column).
body_text:
(Not sure if this is the right place to report a problem with this tutorial.)
I believe that the explanation of matrix multiplication in this image is wrong.
It should be W_1,1 x_1 + W_1,2 x_2 + W_1,3 x_3... (i.e., x should increase per row, not per column).
body:
(Not sure if this is the right place to report a problem with [this tutorial](http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/mnist/beginners/index.md).)

I believe that the explanation of matrix multiplication in [this image](http://api.tensorflow.org/system/image/body/1707/softmax-regression-scalarequation.png) is wrong.

It should be W_1,1 x_1 + W_1,2 x_2 + W_1,3 x_3... (i.e., x should increase per row, not per column).
